name: Prakash

services.title: UX/UI design services
services.description: Collaboratively-produced - low-fidelity UX design sketches, User Interface (UI) design wireframes, Library of working UI design components that help increase design efficiency, Clickable, interactive prototypes.

services.title: Frontend web application development services
services.description: Provides Frontend as a Service to create applications that are easy to interact with for first-time and experienced users to help clients retain their customers.

services.title: Custom web apps/websites development services
services.description: Building custom-made digital solutions allows us to provide our clients with high-quality support in making their business attractive to their customers and accessible online.

aboutpara: I have delivered world-class user experiences to thousands of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks. I have a work experience of more than five years in the web app development field, specializing in frontend development. I've worked with multiple IT companies to deliver top-notch products and quality services throughout the years. From writing articles and blogs in my leisure time, I've also made a huge impact on companies by contributing source codes and providing training to upcoming boot campers.
